title: USIM
extract: Definition of: USIM. USIM. (UMTS Subscriber Identify Module) An application for UMTS cellphones that provides the same features as the SIM card for GSM cellphones. The USIM program runs in a UICC smart card inserted into the phone, which can also be programmed to run on GSM and CDMA networks. See UICC, CSIM and SIM ...
extract_html: Definition of: USIM. USIM. (UMTS Subscriber Identify Module) An application for UMTS cellphones that provides the same features as the SIM card for GSM cellphones. The USIM program runs in a UICC smart card inserted into the phone, which can also be programmed to run on GSM and CDMA networks. See UICC, CSIM and SIM ...
